A Garland of Classics
Victoria Opera House, Ripon Harrogate BBA 1st Annual Contest March: 1. Ripon, 2. Harrogate Silver, 3. Thirsk, 4. Harrogate Boro', 5. Easingwold, 6. Knaresborough 6 bands competed.
